description:
Top half of the second inning, Kirino`s pitcher ends with a 3 down 3 up inning. 
Sakamoto, the ninth batter from Washinomori, hits a solo home run. Kirino are two points behind and they have now finally awakened. 
With Kurokan that keeps changing his strategies and with the strength of Sakamoto`s back, Washinomori is now in the lead.
Source: crunchyroll
